name: GetEnterpriseProjectInfo
description:
Get details of a specific enterprise project.

This tool retrieves information about an existing project within an enterprise plan on Miro. It requires 'projects:read' access and is only available for Company Admins in the Enterprise plan. Use this tool to fetch details like the project's name for a given organization, team, and project ID.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization to retrieve project info from.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization from which you want to retrieve the project information.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team from which you want to retrieve the project information.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team from which you want to retrieve the project information.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project from which to retrieve information. Required for fetching project details.

value_schema.description: The ID of the project for which you want to retrieve the information.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.
